channel.title: Testing client
channel.description: I need someone to help me test my server and see if it runs on there pc.. please add me on skype "bladesskype"

item.title: Testing client
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

Personally I see nothing wrong with requesting this but the fact that if I were to let it slide then the whole section I’m sure would be filled with topics like this. Just jump onto IRC or anything else you can find people on and ask for somebody to test your server. My apologies.

Read full topic

item.title: Testing client
item.dc:creator: @tank_nation tank nation
item.description:
@tank_nation wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:4, topic:551717”][quote author=tank nation link=topic=670632.msg4484283#msg4484283 date=1432868259]

That’s not what this section, or any section, is for…

Do you not have friends or something? Surely one of them should be willing.

No one at all, i dont really have any friends mate lol. i work all the time,.
[/quote]
Regardless, this isn’t what the section is intended for. There are many ways you can test if the client should work for others… One being using a Virtual Machine.[/quote]

Virtual Machine, link?

Read full topic
